sections.title: Chevalier (3.5e) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Chevalier (3.5e) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Aura of Courage (Su) (Chevalier (3.5e))
sections.description: The chevalier projects an aura that provides immunity to fear effects to allies within range, functioning like a 3rd-level paladin's aura of courage.

sections.title: Recklessness (Ex) (Chevalier (3.5e))
sections.description: The chevalier gains a morale bonus equal to his class level on attack and damage rolls on the first round he enters battle against new opponents, usable once per day per opponent group.

sections.title: Controlled Charge (Ex) (Chevalier (3.5e))
sections.description: The chevalier no longer takes the normal -2 penalty to AC when making a charge attack.

sections.title: Stubborn Mind (Ex) (Chevalier (3.5e))
sections.description: If the chevalier fails a saving throw against an enchantment effect, he gets one additional saving throw attempt against the same DC one round later.

sections.title: Poison Immunity (Ex) (Chevalier (3.5e))
sections.description: The chevalier becomes completely immune to all poison effects.

sections.title: Smite Evil (Su) (Chevalier (3.5e))
sections.description: The chevalier can smite evil once per day as if he were a paladin of his character level, gaining bonuses against evil creatures.
